channel.title: Summary :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: In this lab, we introduced several major important topics in Python. Letâ€™s quickly review them. Python Lists Lists in Python allow us to store multiple elements in a single variable, with each element identified by a unique index within the list. Lists can be created using square brackets []: list_a = [] list_b = [5, 3, 7]Adding and Accessing List Items New elements can be added to a list using the append() method:
